LanguageData.FocusProduction.label: Focus Production
LanguageData.FocusProduction.description: The ability to create the drug "Focus".
LanguageData.Powerbench.label: Powerbench
LanguageData.Powerbench.description: A crafting station to create goods made from Power Shards.
LanguageData.PowercoreGenerator.label: Powercore Generator
LanguageData.PowercoreGenerator.description: A large power generator that takes advantage of the energy within Powercore.
LanguageData.PowercoreProduction.label: Powercore Production
LanguageData.PowercoreProduction.description: The ability to create Powercores which can be used for weapons, armors, power generation and defences.
LanguageData.PowershardCombuster.label: Powershard Combuster
LanguageData.PowershardCombuster.description: A small power generator that consumes Power Shards.
LanguageData.Powersharddust.label: Power Shard Dust
LanguageData.Powersharddust.description: Unlocks the ability to crush Power Shards at the Power Bench.
LanguageData.Refineddust.label: Power Shard Dust Refining
LanguageData.Refineddust.description: The ability to refine Power Shard dust to remove impurities.
LanguageData.SuperFocusProduction.label: Super Focus Production
LanguageData.SuperFocusProduction.description: The ability to create the drug "Super Focus".
LanguageData.UltimateSurvival.label: Ultimate Survival
LanguageData.UltimateSurvival.description: Unlocks the ability to research Ultimate Survival Technology.
